name: Evo Game Engine
description:
Evo Game Engine is a small , lightweight, 2d game engine for multiple platforms. Evo is made to be Simple, Easy, and Powerful at the same time. Due to its engine being written on html, your games made with Evo can run on Windows,Linux,Apple, Android, iOS, and Nintendo Switch! With Evo the possibility's are endless! Create any type of game you want and import external library's like babylon.js to make 3d games too! 

Developers Note:

Evo is in early, early development. Features will be added every week so make sure you keep an eye on this page over the next few months to see what crazy new features we added.
